task.title: Deleting a message
task.shortdesc: The plugin enables original authors to delete their messages at any time.

step.cmd: Press the button in the message you'd like to delete
step.stepresult: A modal asking you whether you want to delete the message opens.

taskbody.result: You've deleted the message.Deleting a message can't be undone.Adobe XD often saves earlier states of cloud documents which you can later return to. As the plugin saves the chat messages in the document's metadata, they may exist in these earlier versions even after deleting them.
